import React from 'react'; const Books = (props) => { return(
{props.books.length > 0 ? ( props.books.map(book => ( )) ) : ( )}
id Name Author Year Edit Delete
{book.id} {book.name} {book.author} {book.year}
No Books Available
) } export default Books;
